title: Got hacked, can't send in ticket, keep getting "we're sorry, something went wrong"
body:
So, I've been playing league since 2009. I have never played ranked, never been hacked in all those years, and today, I found out that I did. And I can't send in a ticket because it keeps giving me an error, even typed a long message, which was lost, tried again, copied, then tried. Still an error. I really want this issued resolved asap. As i'm under great stress about this. They used all 3 of my refunds, to buy some random skin, played ranked on my account, and gifted skins to two other random accounts that I do not know, and suspect they are the culprits. This person also deleted all my friends and added random people I do not know. I really would like Riot to help me fix this issue. I can't even see my RP purchase history because it gives me an error. Which I think this account has been hacked for about the beginning of October. So I'm not sure If any money is missing from my account or not yet. 

Please help me.

replies.body: It sounds like you're able to still access your account for the time being, which is really good!  Go over our [account protection ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751664-Protecting-Your-Account)guide to secure your information in league and out of it too.  If the ticketing system isn't working for you, that's okay!  You can email us at through support@riotgames.com, and it will work in just the same way!  We'll reach out as soon as we can!
the same happenedto me i need help too they changed my email!

The same thing happened to me but the person that hacked me kept sending hacked links to others do you know if anything could be done if yes please tell me .My country seems to be one of those countries that they do not provide support.

i found the solution they blocked your support page, and i pressed the back button every time they want to redirect me i am not sure if this will work for you but it worked for me after a few times continuously.
